name: Sketchpad Drawing File
summary: Learn about .SKETCHPAD files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: To create a SKETCHPAD file in Sketchpad, select the "Export" floppy disk icon and click "Save Sketchpad" in the menu. You can also save an image in Sketchpad as a .JPEG, .PNG, .PDF, or .SVG file. To open a SKETCHPAD file in Sketchpad, select the "Import" folder icon.
NOTE: Sketchpad is available as a desktop program for Windows and macOS and as a web program.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
